column1: Turn the setscrew into the button.
Place the button inside the housing.
Insert the battery into the battery holder on the PCB (observe correct polarity!).
Place the PCB inside the enclosure
column2: make sure that when the button is pressed
column3: it actuates the switch on the PCB.

column1: Close the enclosure by placing the acrylic plate on the bottom side of the enclosure and secure it with the screws.
